title: A quick drive to downtown, Google & MORE! Renovated 1st floor 1BR w/WD
posting_body: ['Madrone: Apartments in Mountain View', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x535', 'From $3,605', '.', '1 Bed 1 Bath .', '520 Sq.Ft', '* Unit 145 - Available 09/02/22', 'Madrone', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '111 North Rengstorff Avenue Mountain View, CA 94043', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Fill your lifestyle with fun and relaxation in this beautiful one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment at Madrone!', 'Spend your afternoon break sipping your favorite coffee on the cottage-style patio or balcony.', 'Show off your cooking skills in the L-shaped kitchen featuring a stainless steel appliance set and granite or quartz countertops.', 'You can save electricity costs using the Nest thermostat that comes standard.', 'For your peace of mind, this apartment has Latch keyless access.', 'Experience spa-like relaxation with wonderful amenities such as a heated pool, saltwater pool, and sundecks.', 'Enjoy picking in-season produce you’ve planted in the citrus and herb orchard.', 'Make some s’mores with friends at the bonfire pit!', 'Other desirable amenities include a clubhouse and a fitness center.', 'Call now for latest pricing and availability!', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT\u2002 \u2002FEATURES', 'Washer and Dryer', 'Renovated Home', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', 'Variable', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', '9:00am to 5:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x535', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
